data.name: PageTitle
data.comment: Page title for recently deleted items

data.name: PageDescription
data.value: Les éléments qui ont été supprimés peuvent être restaurés dans les 30 jours.
data.comment: Page description text

data.name: Description
data.value: Les éléments ci-dessous seront définitivement supprimés après 30 jours. Vous pouvez les restaurer ou les supprimer définitivement plus tôt.
data.comment: Description text explaining 30-day retention

data.name: NoItems
data.comment: Title when no deleted items exist

data.name: NoItemsDescription
data.value: Les éléments que vous supprimez apparaîtront ici pendant 30 jours avant d'être définitivement supprimés.
data.comment: Description when no deleted items exist

data.name: Untitled
data.comment: Fallback name for items without a name

data.name: DaysRemaining
data.comment: Text showing how many days until permanent deletion

data.name: ExpiringSoon
data.comment: Text shown when item will be deleted within 24 hours

data.name: Restore
data.comment: Button text to restore a deleted item

data.name: EmptyAll
data.comment: Button text to permanently delete all items

data.name: ConfirmDeleteTitle
data.comment: Title for delete confirmation modal

data.name: ConfirmDeleteMessage
data.value: Cette action ne peut pas être annulée. L'élément sera définitivement supprimé de votre coffre.
data.comment: Message in delete confirmation modal

data.name: DeletePermanently
data.comment: Button text to confirm permanent deletion

data.name: ConfirmEmptyAllTitle
data.comment: Title for empty all confirmation modal

data.name: ConfirmEmptyAllMessage
data.value: Ceci supprimera définitivement {0} élément(s). Cette action est définitive.
data.comment: Message in empty all confirmation modal

data.name: Restoring
data.comment: Loading message while restoring

data.name: RestoreSuccess
data.comment: Success message after restore

data.name: RestoreFailed
data.value: Échec de la restauration de l'élément.
data.comment: Error message when restore fails

data.name: Deleting
data.comment: Loading message while deleting

data.name: DeleteSuccess
data.comment: Success message after permanent deletion

data.name: DeleteFailed
data.comment: Error message when deletion fails

data.name: EmptyAllSuccess
data.value: Tous les éléments ont été supprimés définitivement.
data.comment: Success message after emptying trash

data.name: EmptyAllPartialFailed
data.comment: Error message when some deletions fail
